entities.name: NVIDIA OMNIVERSE ENTERPRISE
entities.description: NVIDIA Omniverse Enterprise is a platform announced at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference, offering general availability for collaborative 3D design, digital twins, and virtual worlds.

entities.name: NVIDIA RIVA
entities.description: NVIDIA Riva is one of the 65 new and updated software development kits announced at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.

entities.name: NVIDIA MODULUS
entities.description: NVIDIA Modulus is one of the 65 new and updated software development kits announced at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.

entities.name: NVIDIA QUANTUM-2
entities.description: NVIDIA Quantum-2 is a 400Gbps switch and end-to-end networking platform announced at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.

entities.name: NVIDIA JETSON AGX ORIN
entities.description: NVIDIA Jetson AGX Orin is a platform for edge AI and autonomous machines announced at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.

entities.name: GEFORCE RTX 30 SERIES
entities.description: GeForce RTX 30 Series is a line-up of GPUs expanded in the Gaming platform during fiscal year 2022.

entities.name: NVIDIA DLSS
entities.description: NVIDIA DLSS is a technology announced to be integrated into the Unity game engine.

entities.name: GEFORCE NOW
entities.description: GeForce NOW is a gaming platform where a new high-performance membership tier was introduced.

entities.name: NVIDIA A30
entities.description: NVIDIA A30 is a GPU launched for mainstream AI, data analytics, and graphics.

entities.name: NVIDIA A10
entities.description: NVIDIA A10 is a GPU launched for mainstream AI, data analytics, and graphics.

entities.name: NVIDIA-CERTIFIED SYSTEMS
entities.description: NVIDIA-Certified Systems is a new class of systems debuted with leading server OEMs.

entities.name: NVIDIA GRACE

entities.name: NVIDIA AI ENTERPRISE

entities.name: NVIDIA BASE COMMAND
entities.description: NVIDIA Base Command is an AI software offering unveiled by NVIDIA.

entities.name: FLEET COMMAND AL
entities.description: Fleet Command Al is an AI software offering unveiled by NVIDIA.

entities.name: EARTH-2
entities.description: Earth-2 is an AI supercomputer announced to be built to address the global climate change crisis.

entities.name: NVIDIA RTX GPUS
entities.description: NVIDIA RTX GPUs are unveiled for next-generation notebook and desktop workstations.

entities.name: NVIDIA OMNIVERSE FOR CREATORS
entities.description: NVIDIA Omniverse for Creators is a platform launched for collaborative 3D design, digital twins, and virtual worlds.

entities.description: NVIDIA DRIVE Atlan is a next-generation SOC unveiled in the Automotive platform.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA announced the general availability of NVIDIA Omniverse Enterprise at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA Riva as one of the 65 new and updated software development kits at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA Modulus as one of the 65 new and updated software development kits at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA ReOpt as one of the 65 new and updated software development kits at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA Morpheus as one of the 65 new and updated software development kits at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA cuNumeric as one of the 65 new and updated software development kits at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA Clara Holoscan as one of the 65 new and updated software development kits at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA Quantum-2, a 400Gbps switch and end-to-end networking platform, at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA announced NVIDIA Jetson AGX Orin, a platform for edge AI and autonomous machines, at the November 2021 GPU Technology Conference.
NVIDIA expanded the GeForce RTX 30 Series GPU line-ups in its Gaming platform during fiscal year 2022.
NVIDIA announced plans to integrate NVIDIA DLSS into the Unity game engine.
NVIDIA introduced a new high-performance membership tier to GeForce NOW.
NVIDIA launched NVIDIA A30 GPU for mainstream AI, data analytics, and graphics in its Data Center platform.
NVIDIA launched NVIDIA A10 GPU for mainstream AI, data analytics, and graphics in its Data Center platform.
NVIDIA debuted a new class of NVIDIA-Certified Systems with leading server OEMs.
NVIDIA unveiled NVIDIA Grace, its first Arm-based data center CPU, in its Data Center platform.
NVIDIA launched the NVIDIA AI Enterprise software suite for AI applications in its Data Center platform.
NVIDIA unveiled NVIDIA Base Command, an AI software offering, in its Data Center platform.
NVIDIA unveiled Fleet Command Al, an AI software offering, in its Data Center platform.
NVIDIA announced plans to build Earth-2, an AI supercomputer dedicated to addressing the global climate change crisis.
NVIDIA unveiled NVIDIA RTX GPUs for next-generation notebook and desktop workstations.
NVIDIA launched NVIDIA Omniverse for Creators for collaborative 3D design, digital twins, and virtual worlds.
NVIDIA unveiled NVIDIA DRIVE Atlan, a next-generation SOC, in its Automotive platform.
Mercedes-Benz announced design wins for the AI cockpit in its new EQS sedan, utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Volvo Cars announced design wins for the autonomous driving computer in its next-generation cars, beginning with the XC90 in 2022, utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
R-Auto announced design wins for energy vehicles utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
IM Motors announced design wins for energy vehicles utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
NIO announced design wins for energy vehicles utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Faraday Future announced design wins for energy vehicles utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
VinFast announced design wins for energy vehicles utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Xpeng announced design wins for energy vehicles utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Cruise announced design wins for robotaxis utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Amazon Zoox announced design wins for robotaxis utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Pony.ai announced design wins for robotaxis utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
AutoX announced design wins for robotaxis utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Embark announced design wins for autonomous trucking companies utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Kodiak Robotics announced design wins for autonomous trucking companies utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Plus announced design wins for autonomous trucking companies utilizing NVIDIA's technology.
Jaguar Land Rover formed a multi-year partnership with NVIDIA to jointly develop and deliver next-generation automated driving systems, plus AI-enabled services and experiences.
Desay is using the NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion platform to manufacture safe and secure AV systems for vehicle makers.
Flex is using the NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion platform to manufacture safe and secure AV systems for vehicle makers.
Quanta is using the NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion platform to manufacture safe and secure AV systems for vehicle makers.
Valeo is using the NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion platform to manufacture safe and secure AV systems for vehicle makers.
ZF is using the NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion platform to manufacture safe and secure AV systems for vehicle makers.
